alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 7:58PM MST until January 04 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches with isolated higher amounts. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Fredonia, Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake, Kachina Village, Munds Park, North Rim, Sedona, Valle and Williams. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 7 PM Today to 8 AM Thursday: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 1 to 3 inches Fredonia 0 to 1 inches Grand Canyon 1 to 3 inches Jacob Lake 3 to 5 inches Kachina Village 1 to 3 inches Munds Park 2 to 4 inches North Rim 2 to 4 inches Sedona 0 to 1 inches Valle 1 to 2 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim
